Event Types













 May 1


Summer Session 2023 Tabling Events

 Coyote Walkway-CGI

 Behind Pfau Library

 VA-Patio (C1), VA-102 (Sem)

 SMSU 208, SMSU 207, SMSU - Sky Box 207/208

 11:00am - 1:30pm
 Coyote Walkway-CGI

Wounds de La Familia: Understanding and Healing From Intergenerational Trauma 

 12:00pm - 1:00pm
 In-Person: Room SB-306 (Social and Behavioral Sciences Building) live broadcast via Zoom










 May 2


"Paid For By Crime: Civil Asset Forfeiture and the War on Drugs, "In Conversation with Kenneth Alyass (Harvard)

 1:00pm - 2:15pm
 Zoom link: https://csusb.zoom.us/j/97960458784

 Zoom Meeting

 Zoom Meeting

Narcan 101
